original: Clason, Karl Alex Georg, tandläkare, Kalmar, f. 2/1/87 i Döderhult, Kalmar 1., av Carl Johan C. o. Inga Mathilda Larsson. G. 19 m. Gudrun Un-neberg. Barn: Leif f. 19, fil. kand., Bertil 22, farm. kand. o. odont. kand. — Stud:ex. i Lund 12, tandlikand. 14, tandläk. 17. Praktik i Åmål 18, i Kalm. sed. 19, skoltandl. v. Kalm. folksk. 19-20. Sekr. i Kalm. 1. tandl:-sällsk. 33-35, skattmäst. 35-39.
translated: Clason, Karl Alex Georg, dentist, Kalmar, b. 2/1/87 in Döderhult, Kalmar 1., son of Carl Johan C. and Inga Mathilda Larsson. Married in 19xx to Gudrun Un-neberg. Children: Leif b. 19, B.A., Bertil b. 22, B.Pharm., and B.D.S. — Graduated from Lund University with matriculation certificate in 1912, dental degree in 1914, and became a licensed dentist in 1917. Practiced in Åmål in 1918, and Kalmar from 1919. School dentist at Kalmar public schools from 1919-1920. Secretary of the Kalmar Dental Society from 1933-1935, and treasurer from 1935-1939.
